privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionContent: At AI Photo Editor, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our AI-powered photo editing and printing services.
privacy.dataCollectionContent: We collect the following types of information:
privacy.personalInfoContent: When you sign in with Google, we collect your name, email address, and profile picture. This information is used to create and manage your account.
privacy.photoDataContent: We store the photos you upload for editing, including both original and processed versions. Photos are associated with your account and stored securely in our systems.
privacy.usageDataContent: We collect information about how you use our service, including pages visited, features used, and interaction patterns to improve our service quality.
privacy.orderInfoContent: When you place orders, we collect shipping addresses, order details, and payment information necessary to fulfill your print orders.
privacy.dataUsageContent: Your information is used for the following purposes:
privacy.serviceProvisionContent: To provide AI photo editing services, process your photos, and fulfill print orders.
privacy.accountManagementContent: To create and maintain your user account, authenticate your identity, and provide personalized experiences.
privacy.communicationContent: To send order confirmations, shipping updates, and important service notifications.
privacy.improvementContent: To analyze usage patterns and improve our AI algorithms and user experience.
privacy.dataSecurityContent: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
privacy.encryptionContent: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using advanced encryption protocols.
privacy.accessControlContent: Access to your data is restricted to authorized personnel only and is logged for security purposes.
privacy.regularAuditsContent: We conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments to maintain the highest security standards.
privacy.dataRetentionContent: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.yourRightsContent: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy.accessRightContent: You can request access to all personal data we hold about you.
privacy.correctionRightContent: You can request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete personal data.
privacy.deletionRightContent: You can request deletion of your personal data, subject to legal and contractual obligations.
privacy.portabilityRightContent: You can request a copy of your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
privacy.thirdPartyServicesContent: Our service integrates with the following third-party providers:
privacy.googleAuthContent: We use Google OAuth for secure authentication. Google's privacy policy applies to data processed by Google.
privacy.aiProcessingContent: Photos are processed using external AI services. These services process photos temporarily and do not retain your data.
privacy.paymentProcessingContent: Payment information is processed by secure third-party payment processors and is not stored on our servers.
privacy.cookiesContent: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. We do not use tracking cookies for advertising purposes.
privacy.childrenPrivacyContent: Our service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.policyChangesContent: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by email or through our service.
privacy.contactInfoContent: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
privacy.addressContent: AI Photo Editor Privacy Team, 123 Tech Street, Digital City, DC 12345, United States

returns.title: Returns Policy
returns.introductionContent: At AI Photo Editor, we want you to be completely satisfied with your printed photos. This Returns Policy outlines the conditions and process for returning products and requesting refunds.
returns.eligibilityContent: We accept returns under the following conditions:
returns.qualityIssuesContent: If your printed photos have quality defects, color issues, or printing errors that are our responsibility, we will provide a full refund or replacement.
returns.damagedItemsContent: Items damaged during shipping will be replaced at no cost. Please report damage within 48 hours of delivery.
returns.wrongOrderContent: If you receive the wrong photos or incorrect print specifications due to our error, we will correct the order at no charge.
returns.timeLimitContent: Return requests must be initiated within 30 days of delivery for quality issues and within 7 days for damaged items.
returns.nonEligibleContent: The following items are not eligible for return:
returns.customOrdersContent: Photos printed according to your specifications and preferences cannot be returned unless there is a quality defect or error on our part.
returns.personalPhotosContent: Due to the personal nature of photo printing, returns based on personal preference or change of mind are not accepted.
returns.digitalProductsContent: AI photo editing services and digital downloads are final and cannot be returned once delivered.
returns.processContent: To initiate a return, please follow these steps:
returns.step1Content: Email us at returns@aiphotoeditor.com with your order number, photos of the issue (if applicable), and a description of the problem.
returns.step2Content: We will review your request and provide a Return Authorization (RA) number if your return is approved.
returns.step3Content: Carefully package the items in their original condition. Include the RA number on the package.
returns.step4Content: Send the package to the address provided in your return authorization. Keep your tracking number for reference.
returns.step5Content: Once we receive and inspect your return, we will process your refund or replacement within 5-7 business days.
returns.ourFaultContent: If the return is due to our error (quality issues, wrong order, damaged items), we will provide a prepaid return shipping label.
returns.customerFaultContent: For returns not due to our error, customers are responsible for return shipping costs.
returns.shippingMethodContent: Use a trackable shipping method and retain your tracking number. We recommend insuring valuable returns.
returns.shippingTimeContent: Returns typically take 3-5 business days to reach our facility, depending on your location and shipping method.
returns.refundMethodContent: Refunds will be processed to the original payment method used for the purchase.
returns.refundTimeContent: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive and approve your return.
returns.refundAmountContent: Full refunds include the product cost and original shipping charges (if the return is due to our error).
returns.partialRefundsContent: Partial refunds may apply if items are returned in used or damaged condition not caused by our error.
returns.replacementsContent: For quality issues or errors, we offer free replacements as an alternative to refunds.
returns.exchangesContent: We do not offer exchanges for different products. Please place a new order for different items.
returns.cancellationsContent: Orders can be cancelled before printing begins. Contact us immediately if you need to cancel your order.
returns.cancellationTimeContent: Orders can typically be cancelled within 2 hours of placement, before production begins.
returns.cancellationRefundContent: Cancelled orders receive full refunds within 3-5 business days.
returns.disputeResolutionContent: If you are not satisfied with our resolution, please contact our customer service manager for further assistance.
returns.contactInfoContent: For returns, refunds, or questions about this policy, please contact us:
returns.addressContent: AI Photo Editor Returns Department, 456 Fulfillment Ave, Shipping Center, SC 67890, United States

photo.title: Photo Processing Error
photo.description: There was an issue processing your photo. This could be due to file format, size, or a temporary service issue.

suggestions.title: Please try:
suggestions.format: Using a different image format (JPG, PNG)
suggestions.quality: Ensuring the image is clear and well-lit

cart.title: Cart Error
cart.description: There was an issue loading your cart. Your items may still be saved.
cart.message: Don't worry - your cart items are usually preserved. Try refreshing the page or navigating back to continue shopping.

auth.title: Authentication Error
auth.description: There was an issue with your authentication. Please sign in again.
auth.message: Your session may have expired or there was a connection issue. Please try signing in again.
